title: Strengthening Systems Design Competencies: Participant-Centered Creative Language Learning in Communion with Nature

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners produce descriptive expressions of three or more sentences based on observational data collected from natural environments.
Learners perform a 5-minute role-play explaining strategies to overcome obstacles through verbal communication in collaboration with peers.
Learners present problems encountered during creative activities using natural materials through a three-step problem-solving process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
